name: Idol Hunter: Hentai
description:
Idol Hunter — is a story about hacker who earns money by hacking idols. At your service there are dossiers of several girls with different destinies and fetishes. Crack them and obtain their nude photos for customer, find out their mysteries and keep their pics as a marvelous bonus.
GamePlay:
Here is a program code in which you need to find errors. In the right corner there is a task that describes which characters you need to find.As soon as you find all the errors in the code you get the desired result :)
Features:
Colorful animated CG-arts
Each idol has their own fetishes demonstrated in their hacked material.
Pleasant soundtracks
Mini-game
Your own gallery with pretty nudes
